title: Tinyhorse1942
html_content:
TinyHorse's profile Likes list, liking a tweet by Chris's main Twitter account

tinyhorse1942, aka TinyHorse, is a Twitter account suspected to be a sock used by Chris for evading blocks on his main account. The account was created in March 2021. Posts strongly resembling Chris's writing style appeared in January 2024. The account name is derived from Caden Peck's online handle tinyhorse01, possibly meaning Caden gave the account to Chris. It is used mainly to follow several of the current and previous TF2 Analysts, ProjectSNT, Nowacking and Gleamy Dreams, all of whom have blocked Chris's main account on Twitter, as well as several Finnish learning platforms. Nowadays, it has devolved into another channel of the typical anti-G5 protests.

ILoveKPAlot

27 January

ILoveKPAlot
I‚Äôm having doubts about my content. What would you guys want to see if we continued it? Or what do you like about it?
TinyHorse
Personally, I saw your passion light up when it came to Discord and John DeLancy in the views of that which is good out of the chaos and bad. I‚Äôd say explore something unique that is you from that and what else you find that feels right with you; something animated.

Today, we said goodbye for the last time to my mum's little shadow Baba (Misty).

Thank you for the last 16 years. You're now united with Jess.

[posts an image reading "Sending Prayers"]

February 2024

Block Arguing

3 February

TIShadow6 and Jasper Pie comment about blocking Chris's main Twitter account CPU_CWCSonichu. TinyHorse is defensive over the blocks.

Shadow
Well, that was a second of utter fear to have this morning.

ANYWAYS, Day 2 of @HarmonyPonyCon

[posts an image of CPU_CWCSonichu following Shadow's account]

Dennison
did you block them?
Shadow
I did, yes.
TinyHorse
Why?
What did she ever personally do to you? Do you actually know her personally enough to warrant such an action?

It‚Äôs Like in that DJPon3 song, ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt judge somepony that you don‚Äôt even know. In this business, it don‚Äôt matter if you‚Äôre music‚Äôs fast or slow.‚Äù

If you only blocked her for simply her following you or even just the ‚ÄúDrama‚Äù, well I gotta say that is just disappointing.

[posts a gif of a cartoon rabbit shaking its head]

Jasper Pie
I blocked him too.... guess he "forgot."
TinyHorse
Why?
Jasper Pie
Why did I block him or why did he "forget?"
TinyHorse
Why did you block her? And forget what?

What did she ever personally do to you? Do you actually know her personally enough to warrant such an action?

Jasper Pie
I found her behavior to be inappropriate, she made me feel very uncomfortable at a convention where she stared at me and tried to follow me, and I really just didn't want to get involved in the drama.
TinyHorse
Have you ever thought that she might have been a fan who recognized you after having watched some of your videos? I know from one convention I went to, I actually saw TheLostNarrator in the vendor hall, but I was having a tough time recognizing. TLN might have felt that with me.

Never mind; it restored me back to where I was.

Likes

As of April 2024, the account has 266 Likes. The Likes either strongly correspond with those commonly found on Chris's CPU_CWCSonichu account or match his interests. Likes include internet celebrities he is obsessed over and who have blocked his main account, fanart of My Little Pony characters including Fluttershy, a platform for learning Finnish, and Chris's tweets on his CPU_CWCSonichu account.
